);

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Forecast (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 product_name STRING,
 forecasted_quantity INT,
 date DATE);


CREATE TABLE Inventory (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 product_name STRING,
 quantity INT);


CREATE TABLE Warehouse (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 warehouse_name STRING,
 location STRING);


CREATE TABLE Supplier (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 supplier_name STRING,
 contact_info STRING);


CREATE TABLE Shipment (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 product_id INT,
 warehouse_id INT,
 supplier_id INT,
 shipment_date DATE);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE Forecast SET forecasted_quantity = forecasted_quantity + 10 WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
